definition: erhua variant of 腦瓜|脑瓜[nao3 gua1]

sentences.english: She was a clever child, and the other girls loved to listen to her.
sentences.chinese: 她腦瓜兒很聰明，別的女孩兒都愛聽她講故事。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, it occurred to me that my money was missing.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，我只感到腦瓜子嗡地一下響，糟了，錢沒了。

sentences.english: Leave a comment to help the other curly-haired brains.
sentences.chinese: 留下你的評論幫助其他的捲髮小腦瓜們吧。

sentences.english: Might as well get that out of your 22 year old head right now.
sentences.chinese: 最好把那些鬼話從你22歲的腦瓜裏清除掉。

sentences.english: But new research suggests we may be wildly underestimating their brainpower.
sentences.chinese: 最新研究表明父母們可能低估了孩子們的小腦瓜。

sentences.english: If a person gets knocked on the head, that person's mind goes away.
sentences.chinese: 如果敲擊一個人腦瓜，就會敲掉他的心靈。

sentences.english: Her ------------ was crammed with too many thoughts.
The abacus is just a visual record of the computations going on in the mind of the person using it.
sentences.chinese: 算盤只是直觀記錄下人們腦瓜子裏的運算過程罷了。
